700340f-b.text:
(1)
West 227th Street, at Independence Ave., showing the Henry Hudson Monument. In the background appears, under construction the St. FPancis
Home (annex).
May 25, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A view of the south side of St. Francis Home.
May 25, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
